Post.title: Forum Post
Post.description: Represents a single post or question in the forum.

content.description: The main content of the post.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who created the post.

authorName.description: The display name of the post author.

continent.description: The continent the post is related to.

Opinion.title: Forum Opinion
Opinion.description: Represents a single opinion or general discussion topic.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the opinion.

authorName.description: The display name of the opinion author.

Reply.title: Post Reply
Reply.description: Represents a reply to a forum post.

postId.description: The ID of the post this reply belongs to.

authorId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the reply.

authorName.description: The display name of the reply author.
